introDesc: We have flexible plans whether you are subscribing for the office or for yourself

jumbotrons.title: Our Story and Mission
jumbotrons.desc: Finding a way to serve eachother accross the world.

items.desc:
For every coffee bag we send to you, we will donate 10% of our profits to a charity of your choice.

We believe in paying it forward to those in need. Money should never be a concernt to those who need it. Our team goes out to Africa every year to build houses. Check out the about page to learn more about our trip to Africa!
